tool_description: A paraphrasing tool / article rewriter API that can automatically rewrite sentences, phrases or paragraphs.  This service can  quickly and  easily remove plagiarised material and therefore we do not endorse the use of this tool for unethical applications.
name: Paraphrasing Tool
title: Paraphrasing Tool

api_list.name: Rewrite
api_list.description: This endpoint automatically rewrites sentences, phrases or paragraphs and removes plagiarised material.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paraphrasing-tool1.p.rapidapi.com/api/rewrite"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paraphrasing-tool1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://paraphrasing-tool1.p.rapidapi.com/api/rewrite"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paraphrasing-tool1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
